title: The Birth of Athena
description: Help Athena pop out of Zeus' head and make sure she stays a virgin.
goalStr: Add `(virgin athena)` to the fact table. You can only add **deities** and pass around them a single **helmet**.
successStr: The myths say that Hephaestus actually attempted to rape Athena but the goddess of wisdom, craft, **war**, diplomacy, weaving, poetry, medicine, and commerce knew how to defended herself (*surprise, surprise*).
